With auditions set to begin on March 27th in Los Angeles, people can register online now by going to href="http://www.fox.com/thexfactor/registration/" rel="nofollow"> Fox.com/ thexfactor. We actually do the auditions in arenas where you have to perform in front of 4,000-5,000 people. It's a long day. You'll begin to understand why I become very grumpy, Simon Cowell told Nancy O'Dell during the ET interview that aired tonight on ABC. The X Factor auditions are open to vocal groups and solo singers, over the age of 12- and there's no upper age limit.
